import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidebar.component.css'], }) export class SidebarComponent { constructor(private router: Router) {} currentPage: string = ''; isAdmin = localStorage.getItem('isAdmin') ngOnInit() { this.currentPage = this.router.url; } //Route to desired screen routePage(pageToRoute: any) { alert('Routing to ' + pageToRoute); this.router.navigate([`/${pageToRoute}`]); } //Logout logout() { this.router.navigate([`/`]); localStorage.setItem('isAuthenticated', 'false'); } }
